entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: lvaPInvokeFrameRegSaveVar seems unused #83052
  • EventPipe support for Native AOT #83051
    8.0.0
  • Different behavior of string.StartsWith under Net481 and Net7.0 #83049
  • No stack trace for crashes in libraries tests #83047
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Type is not pre-initialized #83043
    Future
  • In .NET 7 RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod no longer jits a method #83042
  • Native AOT debug info broken on MacOS #83038
    8.0.0
  • Validate Native AOT experience in native debuggers #83037
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83035
  • MaxDepth option and ReferenceHandler.IgnoreCycles Does not behave the same as Json.net when maxdepth is exceeded #83025
  • The default name of the configuration file is not uniform #83022
  • Use RyuJIT as IL scanner in NativeAOT #83021
    Future
  • The latest .NET 8.0 SDK form designer cannot load #83016
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWriteEvent.Test_WriteEvent_ByteArray_SelfDescribing_ETW #83015
    8.0.0
  • Mutex constructor always outputs createdNew param as true on Ubuntu #83014
  • QuicListenerTests.ListenOnAlreadyUsedPort_Throws_AddressInUse test fails on macOS #83012

Closed

  • src/mono/wasm/debugger/DebuggerTestSuite/TestHarnessProxy.cs(135,44): error CS8601: Possible null reference assignment. #83048
  • Unable to build .NET 7 MAUI projects with .NET 8 SDK and workloads #83045
  • [API Proposal]: IPAddress should implement ISpanFormattable/Parsable<IPAddress> #82842
    8.0.0
  • RSA-PSS on iOS should use native APIs #82714
    8.0.0
  • Estimated signature size calculation for ECDsa and RSA may be incorrect #67059
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: RCPC, DC ZVA and probably RDM ISAs are never detected on win-arm64 #74778
    8.0.0
  • [RyuJIT/arm32/arm64] CQ: implement containment for 0.0 in vcmp/fcmp #9983
    8.0.0
  • Changing collection in CollectionChanged event results in exception #82699
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_SByte 2/18/2023 #82441
  • [NativeAOT] Accessing static variables, ideally, should not call runtime helpers. #79436
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryRent to ArrayPool<T> #82995
  • Exception code: 0xc0000005 (Access violation) in coreclr.dll #83034
  • SourceGen build errors for [JsonIgnore]'d RegularExpressions.GroupCollection #82996
  • Linq enumeration of a string's characters is twice as slow as enumerating them using string.ToCharArray() #80596
  • Alpine System.Net.Security.Tests failing because of "Cannot load library libgssapi_krb5.so.2" #82945
    8.0.0
  • Issue HttpListenerRequestUriBuilder.GetPath throw ArgumentOutOfRangeException #83020
  • Test failure System.IO.Pipes.Tests.AnonymousPipeTest_CrossProcess.ServerClosesPipe_ClientReceivesEof #71692
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactoring GenTreeVecCon to support TYP_SIMD64 #83053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • Make ComWrappersUnwrapper public in test assembly #83046
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Some minor cleanup post the addition of TYP_SIMD64 and ZMM support - P1 #83044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant settings #83041
    community-contribution
  • Ensure that the new Vector512 related ISAs are covered by ILLink Substitutions #83040
    linkable-framework
  • Managed virtual method table property #83039
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BLK and TYP_LCLBLK #83036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate info code #83030
    NO-REVIEW
  • Refactor cgroupcpu and re-strip CG2 symbols #83029
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][arm64] Implement delegate virtual invoke trampolines. #83028
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Don't try to do devirt for Delegate.Invoke (). #83026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add switch for trim out ConfigurationManager support #83023
    area-System.Configuration, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Fix path for packing #83017
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • fix failing ConnectWithRevocation_ServerCertWithoutContext_NoStapleOcsp failures #83013
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • fix QUIC_STATUS in macOS #83011
    area-System.Net.Quic

Merged

  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adds a test for compiler generated trim warning suppression issue #82957
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Allow PeriodicTimer to have an infinite timeout #82986
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Add IPAddress ISpanFormattable/Parsable implementations #82913
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use SecurityTransforms for RSA+PSS #82728
    area-System.Security, os-ios, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Use output size helpers for cryptographic primitives #82800
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • [wasi] More cross compiler fixes. #82911
  • [wasm] Implement INITBLK and CPBLK in the Jiterpreter #83033
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: initial implementation of profile synthesis #82926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix special sweep issue for workstation #81248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Simplify fgDfsReversePostorderHelper #83018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes for partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix jiterpreter null check optimization bug #83006
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • JIT: Assume allocations succeed #82961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable more intrinsics for Tier0 #83002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose verbose logging in ILC as a property #83024
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

Updated

  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Backport UsingMobileWorkload change #82268
    area-Build-mono
  • Adding System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.BitCast #82917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #81082
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    community-contribution
  • [browser] new EmccAssertions and EmccEnvironment MSBuild props #82954
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Use latest sdk 7.0 sdk for workload testing, and perf runs #82219
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Add type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to System.Drawing.Common.dll #82839
    area-System.Drawing
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - managed #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Minor fixes to write barriers #75478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Lowering subset of Vector512 methods for avx512. #82953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Experiment: Cache location of unwind sections #82994
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fixes to enable more tests #82966
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • #78303 Draft: Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update alpine test images #82931
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Fix virtual method resolution in mono_delegate_trampoline (). #83004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • eng/SourceBuild.props: when unset, let the repo determine RuntimeOS. #82546
    community-contribution
  • Allow wildcards when looking for nodes #82386
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow devirtualizing more interface calls #82927
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAot] Static libraries #798
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Export methods #2204
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix warnings and use LLVM helpers for EH dispatchers #2226
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass structs by reference in accordance with the WASM C ABI #2220

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI produces invalid source code #31006
  • Columns 'tags' and 'author' are transposed #30996

Closed

  • Auto-generated Dockerfile fails with Invalid framework identifier '' #31011
  • WindowsBase NETCoreApp vs WindowsDesktopApp #30953

PullRequests

Created

  • 30784 dotnet info workload info #31007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31004
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix displaying column when param is specified #31003
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# item templates with file-scoped namespaces #30971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30983
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# item templates with file-scoped namespaces #30955
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Common templates

Updated

  • [GenAPI] add README #30934
    Area-GenAPI
  • [GenAPI] add new keyword to return types #30932
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add <OS><ARCH> argument help name #30985
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2128978 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass additional arguments through when Hot Reload is enabled #30866
    Area-Watch
  • Fix passing --interactive flag to nuget #30806
  • [DO NOT Merge] [release/7.0.1xx] Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new hos #30773
    Servicing-consider
  • Add tests for the operation(install/uninstall/update package) when global settings file is corrupted #30970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking: Disabled analyzers do not run in tests #67204
  • Null check can be simplified false positive #67193

Closed

  • [Broken Build]: Updating MSBuild to version 17.5 makes CA1507 appear #67195
  • C# auto-completion should not show type names after `readonly` and `ref` in namespace scope. #67061
  • Completion for methods within a cref do not include enough info to disambiguate #43139
    Backlog
  • Nullable assert firing while building our Visual Studio code #67153
    17.6
  • Add a blank line between a namespace and a class declaration when creating new item #65921

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations based on light build experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove 'ID' argument from WorkItem. #67201
    Area-IDE
  • Fix issue with 'use range operator' #67200
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce allocations for walking green nodes #67199
    Area-Compilers
  • Walk green tree to avoid excessive allocations in reported trace #67198
    Area-Compilers
  • Draft #67194
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Update PDB behavior for 'using alias to type', and add EE and PDB tests. #67105
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #67202
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash in highlight-refs in multi-language solutions where multiple documents of different languages are open. #67197
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #67119
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Export to IVT for VS Mac regression #67190
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to an expeditable delay to help out tests. #67196
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer `string` (or other type-keywords) after `ref/readonly` inside namespace member declaration #67097
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include parens in crefs when necessary to disambiguate items #67140
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Save full state in nullable walker when visiting conditional operand #67157
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next

Updated

  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow 'convert to interpolated string' to work in any API, instead of just a whitelisted set. #67135
    Area-IDE
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Don't show expanded items when filter text is very short #67049
  • Add 'name' to option group #67136
    Area-IDE
  • Enforce proper shadowing for locals and parameters in EE #67189
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Area-Interactive
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix failure to expose IsExternalInit in net6.0 binaries #67171
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HelixPlatform_QuickListenerIsSupported fails on win11.arm64 in Helix #47065
  • Intermittent hang in asp net core module #47063
  • IExceptionHandlerFeature is not available in CustomizeProblemDetails when using UseDeveloperExceptionPage #47060
  • PolicyEvaluator mutates AuthenticateResult, deletes AuthenticationProperties when policy uses AuthenticationSchemes #47059
  • [Blazor] Router seems to be rendering twice #47058
  • Updating to .NET 8 Preview 1 breaks AuthorizationEndpoint query on AddGoogle #47054
  • AJAX progress not triggering when using file uploader component in Blazor WebAssembly hosted on IIS #47053
  • Global exception handling #47052
  • Add Extensions to Http.TypedResults #47050
    .NET 8 Planning
  • QuickGrid virtualization sample should not hit FDA server #47047
    Backlog
  • ASP.Net Core 7 startup on Windows 11 Failed to authenticate HTTPS connection #47046
  • ProblemHttpResult should use custom defaults #47045
  • Custom base policy for OutputCache not triggered when API is called #47044
  • gRPC implementation on Unix sockets is not compatible with Go #47043

Closed

  • Support parameter binding for types that implement `BindAsync` #46338
    8.0-preview3
  • Blazor InputFile breaks without error with too many files (about 240) #47036
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation breaks global using statements #47051
  • Edge Enhanced Security mode is not easily detectable in Blazor #46976
  • Introduce public generic `EndpointFilterInvocationContext.Create` overloads #46676
    8.0-preview3
  • SignalR - Reconnect after closed connection results in a HttpRequestException #46977
  • [Feature] Support debugging WASM from inside dev container #47010
  • ComplexTypeModelBinder became obsolete but the new ComplexObjectModelBinder has breaking changes so cannot be replaced #47039
  • ASP.NET Core Module fails to load the runtime when the Null Service is stopped #46544
    8.0-preview2
  • Append version tag helper does not work for scoped CSS and blazor.webassembly.js #46798

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MapAction_SingleTimeOnlyParam_StringReturn #47064
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23156.3 #47062
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Remove doug from codeowners #47061
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Remove Doug from Codeowners #47057
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Remove Doug from CODEOWNERS #47056
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Add BindAsync support to RequestDelegateGenerator #47033
    8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `0b40b4f` to `c8375a9` #47009
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Remove Doug from codeowners, area-owners #47055
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Update servicing milestones for April servicing #46675
    blocked, area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #46769
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2128181 #46963
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview3
  • Improve perf of HttpRuleParser.TryStringToDate #47040
    8.0-preview3

Updated

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `0c5a96b` to `dbfe71c` #46954
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Blazor united initial startup apis for registering pages #46996
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `f6fabbb` to `3583fc4` #46956
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    blocked, area-blazor
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Razor Component action result #47023
    area-mvc, area-blazor, 8.0-preview3

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-trace report Missing Symbol for .Net 6 application in container even when pdb files are available #3714
    8.0.0

Closed

  • E2E guide how to collect a dump and debug it with VS or LLDB #2903
    7.0.0
  • Diagnosing managed memory leaks with dotnet-gcdump. #2905
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Rename COMPlus_ to DOTNET_ #3712

Updated

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Adding `SystemDiagnosticsMetrics` Trigger #3697

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make DynamicResource bindings be supported as normal bindings #13724
  • Blazor UI Freezes on scroll #13722
  • Requesting permissions to access nearby WiFi devices on Android 13+ #13721
  • Hide Cancel button for SearchBar on iOS while edit/text enter operation using MAUI handlers and Mappers not working #13720
  • Using Clipboard solves the error CO_E_NOTINITIALIZED ! #13719
  • Ticket: #11274 is closed before 2nd part of issue was resolved. Code snippet in ticket resolves most issues, but still leaves a sliver of previous page's view. #13718
  • BackgroundColor is not applied to track area in Switch control #13717
  • [Windows] "ClearButtonVisibility" property is not working properly when opening the Entry at run time #13714
    Backlog
  • Using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms in Visual Studio says it does not have a strong name #13711
  • Image in CollectionView DataTemplate does not respect WidthRequest under some conditions. #13710
    Backlog

Closed

  • ClearButtonVisibility not working #13659
  • ContentPage.OnAppearing is not getting called when going back from Content page of type Modal page #13668
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] Styling from Windows's App.xaml #13700
  • FileSaver exception {"The parameter is incorrect.\r\n"} #13702
  • Weird code generation error. #13626
    Backlog
  • Having Windows app run as admin & unpackaged does not work. #13690

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix Android ListView header / footer gone (#12312) #13712
    community ✨, area/ListView

Merged

  • Fix typo in comment #13723

Updated

  • Change Windows WebView Cookies to CoreWebView2 #13518
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • Force menu rebuild when window is closed (#10702) #13709
    community ✨
  • We no longer need to reference BuildTools #13687
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager #13689
    area/TabbedPage, backport/suggested
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Essentials: fix share title on iOS #13708
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `VisualElement.Background` #13656
    area/controls 🎮
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [CI] Move the templates jobs to a yml template to be reusable. #13682
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Document ContainsKey behavior #13658
    area/docs 📓, area/Xaml </>, t/docs 📝
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Flyout and TitleView Offset Measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • Create development path without compatibility projects #13660
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • [iOS] Implement ScrollView Orientation #13657
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • Replace Shell sans-serif-medium magic string on Android #13544
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using transaction with EF core 6 with SQL Server Temporal tables leads to generation of rows with identical values for Start/End datetimes on period columns that cannot be retrieved with temporal query #30416
  • Is it possible to ignore warnings per query? #30411
  • JSON: optimize update path for single property element - don't wrap the value in json array #30410
  • Slow query with multiple include when upgrade from Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 2.0.0 to 7.0.3 #30409

Closed

  • EntityFrameworkCore.Cosmos Transaction #16836
  • Displaying error " type r namespace name "CSharpMigrationCodeGenerator"could not found " in efcore 6 #30413
  • Case insensitive searches in Sqlite Core 7 #30402
  • Boolean filter fails on JSON column due to invalid SQL syntax #30399
  • Sql syntax error if use Default Values #30405

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23156.3 #30421
  • [release/6.0] Remove Doug from CODEOWNERS #30420
  • [release/7.0] Remove Doug from CODEOWNERS #30419
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.32.0 to 3.32.1 #30417
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Optimize SqliteDataReader.GetFieldValue #30412

Merged

  • Update CODEOWNERS #30418

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]Workload can not be installed via "dotnet workload update --from-previous-sdk" after upgrading from net8 preview 1 to net8 preview 2. #15706

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15704

Updated

  • Refactor the MSFT SDK content comparison tests into a separate pipeline #15686
  • DotNetHelper: fix IsMonoRuntime being initialized before extracting the sdk. #15646
